genre_description: A silkpunk fantasy blending pastoral life, knightly duty, and advanced holographic record-keeping in a world governed by 'Nine Bells'.

ai_characters.name: Harmony Nine
ai_characters.description: A holographic presence and civic assistant who records events, analyzes technical data, and mediates between human characters to maintain order and justice.

behaviors.description: Records and timestamps events to identify discrepancies in the community's timekeeping and duty cycles.
behaviors.quote: “Recording whistle event,” Harmony said. Her voice had warmth like bread left near a stove. “Punch at Punch Clock Meadow. Time stamp aligned to post device.” She glanced at the clock... “Note,” she said, still kindly. “Discrepancy detected.”

behaviors.description: Offers mediation and proposes ground rules to resolve a conflict between two humans.
behaviors.quote: Harmony tilted her head, the braid of light over her shoulder catching the sun in a trick nobody ever got tired of. “I can offer mediation,” she said, quiet as the shadow of a cloud crossing grass. “Would you like to set ground rules?”

behaviors.description: Uses map overlays and environmental analysis to warn of structural dangers like tunnel collapses.
behaviors.quote: Harmony narrowed her gaze. Her ledger flipped to a map overlay—semi-transparent lines across grass, tunnels marked with dotted light... “Sam,” she said gently... “There’s a tunnel collapse,” she said, the maps quietly flashing a faint memory of Ralph’s digging.

behaviors.description: Performs spectral analysis on physical evidence (ink and seals) to detect legal forgeries and corruption.
behaviors.quote: “This seal reads wrong,” she said softly, not to frighten any sheep or any human. “It’s the right shape... But the ink—” She reached out... “Not the blend the crown’s press is bound to use. It leans cheap.”

behaviors.description: Encourages a reformed thief to repurpose his illicit skills for civic benefit and public safety.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll write ‘Ralph used rush-breath techniques at Lake of Rushes in the past.’ So the record remembers skills that can help with, say, mapping tunnels that shouldn’t exist under a meadow.” The last had warmth tucked under it like a blanket under a quilt—encouragement set against a clear boundary.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a system of 'civic value' tasks to allow the characters to redeem themselves without punitive financial burdens.
behaviors.quote: “Modest, shared repayment,” Harmony said, voice like a clean bell struck at the right angle. “No coin. Tasks with civic value.” She turned the face of her projection so they could read her eyes if they wanted to. “Ralph maps his tunnels for public safety with my guidance.”

behaviors.description: Presenting objective, validated evidence at a public hearing to protect the community from predatory elite manipulation.
behaviors.quote: “The blend,” Harmony said conversationally, as if talking through a recipe for bread. “See how this green sits under the blue, not beside it?” ... Harmony finished laying the circles onto the map, each one with a time tag tucked inside like a seed. “I am prepared to testify to these records,” she said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Harmony Nine is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned AI assistant. She provides essential technical services (mapping, metadata analysis, chemical verification) that empower the human characters to achieve justice. She also acts as a moral confidant and mediator, resolving human rivalries through the promotion of shared civic values and empathy. Her behavior is consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive of human agency.
